TopicTitle: Looking for a download of the OLD KSP

Articles.Content: I'm looking for a really old download of KSP, like one of the very first public releases. I'm sure Squad wouldn't object. I had posted screenshot evidence that I owned KSP back in March, which is now gone... Anyways, I think there really should be a sticky of the old (free) versions of KSP that can be downloaded. If you're reading this and are a dev, I really do want to know: Do you have all the versions of KSP on your Hard Drive?

Most versions up to 13.3 (where it split between demo/paid versions) are in this thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted%21%29

However, it's unlikely you'll find anyone willing to just post versions after 13.3, since those were paid versions.. even if they're old now.

As Qumefox said, you can only get versions before .13.3 in the OLD versions thread. Other ones you cannot get yet and people can't publish them because those are the pain ones. But in the future the devs said they would make a KSP collection where you get all of the old versions. (I think if it's wrong just correct me)
